Blaze checked the CR chambers records, it mostly contained information abou=
t the virus but the scanners detected the DNA from Kit Kat, and the hawk DN=
A from Lady Hawk. "I can't tell, the virus could have deteriorated the prog=
ram." she tried to break it down some more but the results still came out i=
nconclusive.
